titles.title: DCEE Tariff Suspension Act
To suspend temporarily the duty on Dichloroethyl Ether.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. DCEE Tariff Suspension Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2014, the duty on Dichloroethyl Ether.
